ARABIC: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Who could do greater wrong than someone who invents lies against Allah or denies His Signs? Evildoers are certainly not successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who is more unjust than he who imputes lies to God or denies His revelations? The sinners will surely not be reprieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who, then, is a greater wrong-doer than he who forges a lie against Allah or rejects His signs as false? Surely the guilty shall not prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Who is more unjust than one who invents falsehood against God or calls His revelations lies? The criminals will certainly have no happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So who is more unjust than one who fabricates a lie concerning Allah and denies His signs? Indeed the guilty shall never prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So who does more wrong than he who forges a lie against Allah or denies His Ayat Surely, the criminals will never be successful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who is then more unjust than who forges a lie against Allah or (who) gives the lie to His communications? Surely the guilty shall not be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And who does greater evil than he who forges against God a lie, or cries lies to His signs? Surely the sinners do not prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who doeth greater wrong than he who inventeth a lie concerning Allah and denieth His revelations? Lo! the guilty never are successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Who is more unjust than the man who invents a falsehood about God or denies His signs? Surely, the guilty shall never prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who then is a greater wrong doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth His revelations? Verily He will not let the culprits fare well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So who is a greater wrongdoer than him who fabricates a lie against Allah, or denies His signs? Indeed the guilty will not be felicitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who doth more wrong than such as forge a lie against Allah, or deny His Signs? But never will prosper those who sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So who does more wrong than he who forges a lie against Allah or denies His Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.)? Surely, the Mujrimun (criminals, sinners, disbelievers and polytheists) will never be successful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Who does greater evil than he who forges a lie about Allah or belies His verses? Indeed, the evildoers do not prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who does greater wrong than someone who fabricates lies about God, or denies His revelations? The guilty will never prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah or denies His signs? Indeed, the criminals will not succeed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:17] And who, that is, no one, does greater evil than he who invents a lie against God, by ascribing a partner to Him, or denies His signs?, [denies] the Qur’ān. Surely, it is that, the sinners, the idolaters, shall not prosper, they shall [never] find happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who doeth greater wrong) who is more insolent and daring vis-a-vis Allah (than he who inventeth a lie concerning Allah and denieth His revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an? (Lo! the guilty) the idolaters (never are successful) they will never be saved or safe from Allah's chastisement.
